p: The applicant provided the full characterisation of the volatile constituents in five batches of the residual fraction obtained by GC‐MS. 48 In total, up to 126 constituents were detected, 74 of which were identified and accounted on average for 99.5% (99.0–99.3) of the product (as the GC area). Besides the six compounds indicated in the product specifications, 20 other compounds were detected at levels > 0.1% and are listed in Table 10. The remaining 48 compounds ranging between 0.002% and 0.1% are listed in the footnote. 49 Among these substances, α‐thujone was detected in four batches (0.009–0.016%), and perillaldehyde in one batch (0.092%).
